content:
Blockchain technology digital transactions ko record karne aur verify karne ke liye istemal ki jati hai. Ye technology decentralized hai, matlab ke isme ek central authority nahi hoti aur isme data network ke sare nodes mein distribute hota hai. Isliye iska data tamper-proof hota hai, matlab koi bhi usme changes nahi kar sakta. Ye ledger secure transactions ke liye use ki jati hai.

Har transaction ke sath ek digital signature hoti hai jise verify kiya jata hai. Ye digital signature ek unique code hota hai jo har transaction ke sath generate hota hai. Isse pata chalta hai ke har transaction legitimate hai ya nahi.

Blockchain technology cryptocurrencies ke liye bahut popular hai. Is technology ki wajah se bitcoin aur dusre cryptocurrencies create huye hai. Lekin iska use bahut sare areas mein ho raha hai, jaise ki supply chain management, healthcare, voting systems, aur bahut kuch. Is technology ke istemal se, data secure rehta hai aur transparency bhi badh jati hai.
